message.content:
Sure, here is a healthy meal plan for you:

Breakfast:
- Overnight oats with mixed berries and chia seeds
- Green smoothie made with spinach, banana, pineapple, and coconut water

Lunch:
- Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, avocado, cucumber, tomatoes, and balsamic vinaigrette dressing
- Fresh fruit salad with watermelon, strawberries, blueberries, and kiwi

Snack:
- Apple slices with almond butter (but you can't have almonds, so maybe try sunflower seed butter instead)
- Carrot sticks with hummus (just make sure it doesn't contain garlic or tahini made from sesame seeds)

Dinner:
- Baked salmon with lemon and herbs (but no garlic or onions)
- Roasted sweet potato wedges with olive oil and rosemary
- Steamed broccoli with a squeeze of fresh lemon juice

Dessert:
- Fresh fruit salad with mango, pineapple, and papaya
- A small piece of dark chocolate (just make sure it doesn't contain dairy or nuts)
